proposals.description: Implement cross-agent communication protocol to enable real-time coordination and shared context. Currently agents operate in isolation, leading to potential inefficiencies and missed optimization opportunities.
proposals.implementation_sketch: Create a shared context system where agents can post status updates, warnings, and insights for other agents to consume. Include dharmic principles of right speech and helpful communication. Enable the tester to inform the proposer about common failure patterns, and the refiner to share successful fix strategies. This promotes collective intelligence while maintaining individual agent autonomy.
